Following up straight after my last post cuz the last post would have been too big, here comes the X-Tornado wich was supposed to be a little bonus at the end of it . Anway here it is for you my try at replicating the X-Tornado from the Sonic-X anime. The X-tornado in terms of looks is a little bit of a hit and miss for me , so there is really noething else to say about that. Performance wise the X-Tornado delivers but is NOT an easy thing to fly, aka the top speed at only 1500m is 350 m/s, so speed is good but it doesnt like to point its nose down making going up or straight up turning a delecate prosedure of tappin W and S. Landing this aircraft is a bit of a pain in the ass cause you have touch the ground at pretty high speeds cause as i mentioned earlier the nose wants to go up all the time, so if you go to speeds below 45 m/s second you will end up finding yourself coming rear first in to the ground. But all and all i am happy with the aircraft, maby because i like a bit of a challenge .

So here a a couple of picks of the aircraft.

And yes it is a fourseater. The high gimballing of the B-9 engines is the main thing keepin this thing from doing infinite flips , plus it runs out of fuel pretty quick .

So i hope you enjoy this little crazy aircraft from the world of Sonic-X .
